event.title: Mali Job Manager Cycles
event.name: GPU cycles
event.description: Number of cycles the GPU was active

event.title: Mali Job Manager Cycles
event.name: IRQ cycles
event.description: Number of cycles with active interrupts

event.name: Fragment wait finish
event.description: Number of cycles Job Slot 0 stalled waiting for the last task to finish

event.name: Fragment wait issue
event.description: Number of cycles Job Slot 0 stalled unable to issue tasks because all available cores were full

event.name: Fragment wait read
event.description: Number of cycles Job Slot 0 stalled waiting for descriptors to be read
